name: Globed In
description:
It's too cold to be stuck in a snowglobe.

Made for the cupsoft game jam in 12 days!

There are 2 known bugs: sometimes you can't jump or the animation is weird when you're climbing branches, just touch some more branches or jump to fix it. Also if you move too soon after you chop down the tree, the camera is off centered, just walk inside to fix it.

https://ko-fi.com/kodishfish if you feel so inclined (i haven't set up itch donations yet)
